This blog was made using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/). 

I mainly use [RStudio](https://posit.co/products/open-source/rstudio/?sid=1) as my text editor and publish it to [GitHub Pages](https://docs.github.com/en/pages).

-   **240913** Blog started
-   **241109** Comment section using [utterances](https://utteranc.es/)
-   **241109** Favicon (a focused crow!)
-   **251211** Kudos button using [code](https://bohemiansultriness.nekoweb.org/goodies/mylikebutton.txt) by [Fritzi](https://bohemiansultriness.nekoweb.org); word count adapted from christopherkenny's Quarto [wordcount](https://github.com/christopherkenny/wordcount) extension, added CJK character fits 
-   **251211** The little black cat cartoon on the landing page is powered by [Neko](https://webneko.net/?white)
-   **251212** RSS feed
-   **251214** Sidebar/Page navigation. See Quarto documentation [here](https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-navigation.html#side-navigation)
- **260127** Dark theme inspired by northern lights

I share the CSS themes I made  [here](work.qmd#category=css). Check them out :->
